blocks.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
blocks.text: If [NAME] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [NAME] can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

blocks.name: Bite
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[STR] to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. *Hit:* DMG[2d10 + STR] piercing damage plus DMG[2d10] lightning damage.

blocks.name: Claw
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[STR] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit:* DMG[2d6 + STR] slashing damage.

blocks.name: Tail
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[STR] to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. *Hit:* DMG[2d8 + STR] bludgeoning damage.

blocks.name: Frightful Presence
blocks.text: Each creature of [NAME]'s choice that is within 120 feet of [NAME] and aware of it must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to [NAME]'s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

blocks.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
blocks.text: [NAME] exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking DMG[16d10] lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

blocks.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
blocks.text: [NAME] beats its wings. Each creature within 15 ft. of [NAME] must succeed on a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw or take DMG[2d6 + STR] bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. [NAME] can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendaryActions.description: [NAME] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [NAME] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
